description: Do not mix the truth with falsehood
Order righteousness to people only after practicing it yourself.
Do not commit abuse on the earth.
Do not prevent people from mosques.
Do not follow anyone blindly.
Do not break the promise.
Do not engage in bribery.
Fight only with those who fight you.
Keep the etiquettes of war.
Protect orphans.
Do not have sexual intercourse during menstrual period.
Breast feed your children for two complete years
Choose rulers by their merit.
No compulsion in religion.
Do not invalidate charity with reminders.
Help those in need by finding them.
Do not consume interest.
Grant more time to repay if the debtor is in hard time.
Write down the debt.
Keep the trust.
Do not spy and backbite.
Believe in all prophets.
Do not burden a person beyond his scope.
Do not become dividend.
Restrain Anger.
Do not be rude in speech.
Think deeply about the wonders and creation of this universe.
Men and Women have equal rewards for their deeds.
Wealth of the dead should be distributed among his family members.
Women also have the right for inheritance.
Do not devour the property of orphans.
Do not marry those in your blood.
Do not consume one another's wealth unjustly.
Family should be led by men.
Be good to others.
Do not be miserly.
Do not keep envy.
Judge with justice between people.
Do not kill each other.
Do not be an advocate for deceit.
Stand out firmly for justice.
Co-operate in righteousness.
Do not co-operate in sin and aggression.
Dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine are prohibited.
Be just.
Punish for crimes in an exemplary way.
Strive against sinful and unlawful acts.
Avoid intoxicants and alcohol.
Do not gamble.
Do not insult others' deities.
Having majority is not a criterion of truth.
Do reduce weight or measure to cheat people
Do not be arrogant.
Eat and Drink, But be not excessive.
Wear good cloths during prayer times.
Forgive others for their mistakes.
Do not turn back in battle.
Protect and help those who seek protection.
Keep purity.
Never give up hope of Allah's Mercy.
Allah will forgive those who have done wrong out of ignorance.
Invitation to God should be with wisdom and good instruction.
No one will bear others' sins.
Be dutiful to parents.
Do not say a word for disrespect to parents.
Do no spend money extravagantly.
Do not kill your children for fear of poverty.
Do not even approach unlawful sexual intercourse.
Do not pursue that of which you have no knowledge.
Speak to people mildly.
Keep aloof from what is vain.
Do not enter others houses without seeking permission.
Allah will provide security for those who believe only in Allah.
Do not enter parents' private room without asking permission.
Walk on earth in humility.
Do not neglect your portion of this world.
Invoke not any other god along with Allah.
Do not engage in homosexuality.
Enjoin right, forbid wrong.
Do not walk in insolence through the earth.
Lower your voice.
Women should not display their finery.
Allah forgives all sins.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
Repel evil by good.
Decide on affairs by consultation.
Try for settlement between people.
Do not ridicule others.
Avoid suspicion.
Do not spy or backbite.
Most noble of you is the most righteous.
Honor guests.
Spend wealth in charity.
No Monasticism in religion.
Those who have knowledge will be given a higher degree by Allah.
Treat non-Muslims in a kind and fair manner.
Save yourself from covetousness.
Seek forgiveness of Allah. He is forgiving and Merciful.
Do not repel one who asks.
Encourage feeding poor.
